description: Updates the schedule for a campaign. This API is idempotent.

parameters.name: schedule
parameters.description: Campaign schedule Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone refreshFrequency (string) --- Time duration in ISO 8601 format.

nested_params.name: startTime
nested_params.description: Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone.

nested_params.name: endTime
nested_params.description: Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone.
